newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Foodmaker coverage started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Foodmaker coverage started.

text.p: EVEREN Securities Inc said Friday it initiated coverage of Foodmaker Inc with an outperformer rating for both the near and long term.
- EVEREN said its earnings per share estimate for 1997 is $0.85 and for 1998 is $0.98.
- The firm's intermediate-term price target for Foodmaker is $16 a share, and its long-term target is $18, EVEREN said. On Friday Foodmaker closed up 7/8 at 14-7/8.
- "We urge investors to capture the price appreciation potential we expect in the shares within 18 months," EVEREN analyst Dean Haskell said in report.
